title: Sual rethei vakvai hnu lo kal rawh
lyrics:
Sual rethei vakvai hnu lo kal rawh,
La l Isua hnenah;
I lungngaihna zawng zawng chu nghat la,
Isua ke bulah.

Aw, nghat langin, nghat langin,
I phurrit zawng zawngte chu,
Aw, nghat langin, nghat langin,
Isua ke bulah.

Aw, ringin chawlhna chu rawn zawng rawh,
Lal Isua hnenah;
I thinlung rit phurh chu kalpui rawh,
Isua ke bulah.

Lo kal la, I rinna a kim ang,
Lal Isua hnenah;
Aw, I thlarau chau chu chawlhtir rawh,
Isua ke bulah.

Lo kal rawh, I tan hmun a awm e,
Lal Isua hnenah;
I sual rit phurh zawng zawng chu nghat la,
Isua ke bulah.
